name: Sex Questions 42
description:
Stimulate Hot Talk and Enjoy Even Hotter Sex Together Tonight!

Sex Questions 42 is a spicy relationship game for intimate couples who want to discover new ways to turn each other on. You alternate asking and answering 21 questions each. Assign points by rating each other's answers. The player with the most points after 42 questions wins. Married partners, lovers, dating couples and even small teams of close friends can play. Same sex play supported as well.

The game challenges you to reveal your naughty side in explicit detail. The questions are designed to entice you to openly discuss a broad range of sexual topics. Some questions may shock and surprise you. Others will get you to dig deeper and examine your core beliefs and hidden assumptions about sex and each other. The random sex questions and your answers are sure to inspire you with lots of sexy new ideas to try. You'll both be hot and ready for more.

Your fun comes in how well you answer each question and how much you're willing to reveal. You'll be encouraged to share your most intimate thoughts and feelings. Thrill and delight each other with excitement mixed with a touch of fear as you venture outside your comfort zone and unlock secret sexual desires. Prepare to discover new erotic territory that's just waiting for you to explore together.

Note that all the questions in this game are intended to be for fun and pleasure. Although serious relationship questions are extremely important, keep them for a different time and place. The sex questions in this game are designed to help you focus on the joyful side of your relationship. When you're both in a playful mood, use the erotic questions to explore how you can spice up your love life with more creative sexual pleasure. Once you both feel comfortable talking about sex, other types of discussions will be much easier too.
